context: does it read to the player or does the player have to do reading on each page to understand what to do next? My child is not proficient enough to read
response: The player has to do the reading.  Not sure how old your child is but I would say this game is geared towards 4th grade and up. Actually my kids took no interest in this game as it is very dated... ie. graphics etc.  Idea behind the game is neat but too dated. Wouldn't recommend

context: I want a cd that I can download to my pc and not have to interact with other sites and don't have ads - just a icon my husband can click on & play?
response: I found that Pretty Good Solitaire was just what my wife and I were looking for.  Lots of games and no ads.  We got the CD just in case something goes wrong with the computer and I have to reload it.  But the game package itself is totally reliable and fun.

context: i have redeem the code in my ps3 system,can i use it again in my ps4 system?
response: It only works one time but if it's the same account on both systems then it's automatically added to your ps4.

context: Im planning to purchase this game CD in US amazon store, will it work on an asian console? i also have an american account BTW
response: I would check the region regarding your console and compare it to the disc's. It won't play if the region for the disc doesn't match your console's. The disc regions can also vary regarding the seller.

context: Is this compatible with a the PS3?
response: Just Because it is blue tooth does not mean it will work with the PS3.  Even Sony itself says on their website that.  I have bought Sony Products that are bluetooth that DO NOT work. you have to ask the corporation to make sure it will.https://support.us.playstation.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/245/~/ps3-compatible-headsets
